name: Toybox Christmas Puzzle
description:
Relaxing puzzle where you have to fit christmas decorations inside a grid.

Plays best on a computer, also works on smartphones.

Spin off version of a bigger toy organizing game that will be released early next year.

Might be updated with more content in the future, depending on feedback.


Controls:

Drag and drop the pieces holding the left button of your computer mouse.

Right click while dragging a piece to put it back where you picked it up from.

Double click a piece to remove it from the grid.

Mouse wheel up or down to adjust background brightness.

B or middle mouse button to change the background color.

R key to reset the level.

Escape key to exit current level.


Smartphone controls:

Touch and hold over a piece to drag it.

Multi touch while dragging a piece to offset it downwards.

Please note: When playing on a smartphone, pieces are offset upwards while being dragged in so the player's finger won't obscure the gameplay; in case you're having trouble placing a piece at the bottom of the grid, hold anywhere on the screen while dragging the piece to offset it back to your finger's position.
